startScreen.title: ✨ AI Architecture Visualization — Made Easy.
startScreen.subtitle: ArchiRender transforms sketches, 2D plans, and 3D models into ultra-photorealistic renders. Professional lighting, textures, and details—without the complex settings.
startScreen.dragDrop: Drag and drop an image here and let ArchiRender work its magic ✨

isometric.title: Isometric to Realism
isometric.description: Convert technical views into ultra-photorealistic isometric renders. The exact geometry and proportions are preserved.

plan.title: 2D → 3D Top View
plan.description: A simple furniture or floor plan is transformed into a marketing image for presentations. With shadows, materials, and light.

style.title: Professional Style
style.description: Choose lighting, camera, and filters. Get studio-quality images: from daylight to evening atmosphere.

error.promptRequired: Please enter a description for your edit.
error.hotspotRequired: Please click on the image to select an area to edit.
error.hotspotRequiredReplace: Please click on the image to select an area to replace.
error.referenceOrPromptRequired: Please upload a reference image or provide a text description for the replacement.
error.noImageToFilter: No image loaded to apply a filter to.
error.noImageToAdjust: No image loaded to apply an adjustment to.
error.noImageToStyle: No image loaded to apply a style to.
error.noImageToPreset: No image loaded to apply a camera preset to.
error.presetFailed: Failed to apply the camera preset. {{error}}

retouchPanel.instruction: Click an area on the image to make a precise edit.
retouchPanel.instructionHotspot: Great! Now describe your localized edit below.
retouchPanel.placeholder: First click a point on the image
retouchPanel.placeholderHotspot: e.g., 'change my shirt color to blue'

replacePanel.title: Reference Object Replacement
replacePanel.instruction1: 1. Click an object on the image you want to replace.
replacePanel.instruction2: 2. Now, provide a reference for the new object.

3dview.title: 3D View to Photorealistic Render
3dview.description: Convert any sketch, collage, or 3D view into an ultra-realistic visualization with studio-quality lighting and high-resolution textures.

isometric.title: Isometric View Photorealistic Render
isometric.description: Convert any isometric view from CAD, Archicad, or your sketches into an ultra-photorealistic render with cinematic lighting and PBR textures.

floorplan.title: 2D Floor Plan to 3D Top-View Render
floorplan.description: Transform any 2D floor plan into a photorealistic 3D top-view visualization, preserving the exact layout, scale, and geometry.

exploded.title: Exploded 3D View Generator
exploded.description: Generate IKEA-style exploded diagrams of furniture or interiors, rendered in ultra-photorealistic quality with PBR textures and perfect component separation.

stylizePanel.title: Quick Stylizer
stylizePanel.description: Restyle your render into a new design aesthetic.

cameraPanel.title: Professional Camera Presets
cameraPanel.description: Apply professional camera presets to simulate real photography settings like aperture, focal length, and depth of field.

adjustmentPanel.title: Apply a Professional Adjustment
adjustmentPanel.placeholder: Or describe an adjustment (e.g., 'change background to a forest')

filterPanel.title: Filter Studio
filterPanel.description: Apply professional photo filters to your interior renders.
